Steps.Message: Update at 22:49 - Hi, this is David from the UK Power Networks messaging team. Thanks for your patience this evening. Our engineers have been in contact with us to let us know that due to complications on site with the repairs to the damaged underground cable caused by another compmnay. The estimated timeframe to restore your power is now between 02:30 and 03:30. We're sorry this is taking longer than expected, and we'll continue to keep you up to date, but if any change to this time comes in from our staff I'll let you know as soon as we hear.

We became aware of a power cut at 16:20. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Update at 22:49 - Hi, this is David from the UK Power Networks messaging team. Thanks for your patience this evening. Our engineers have been in contact with us to let us know that due to complications on site with the repairs to the damaged underground cable caused by another compmnay. The estimated timeframe to restore your power is now between 02:30 and 03:30. We're sorry this is taking longer than expected, and we'll continue to keep you up to date, but if any change to this time comes in from our staff I'll let you know as soon as we hear.

UKPNIncident.PlannedIncidentReason: We're carrying out planned work in your area. For our engineers to carry it out safely they need to turn the power off. We're doing this work as it's essential to provide reliable electricity supplies to your area. We're sorry for any inconvenience caused and thank you for your patience.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: We were investigating an electricity cable that was damaged, causing a power cut in the local area.
